00214 #define p3ENQ_1ST(head, ele, nxt) \
00215     if (head != ele) \
00216     { \
00217       ele->nxt = head; \
00218       head = ele; \
00219     }
00220 
00239 #define p3ENQ_1ST_DBL(head, ele, nxt, prv) \
00240     if (head != ele) \
00241     { \
00242         if ((ele->nxt = head) != NULL) \
00243           ele->nxt->prv = ele; \
00244       head = ele; \
00245     }
00246 
00265 #define p3ENQ_LAST(head, ele, tmpel, nxt) \
00266   ele->nxt = NULL; \
00267     if (head == NULL) \
00268       head = ele; \
00269     else \
00270     { \
00271       tmpel = head; \
00272         while (tmpel->nxt != NULL && tmpel->nxt != ele) \
00273           tmpel = tmpel->nxt; \
00274         if (tmpel->nxt == NULL) \
00275           tmpel->nxt = ele; \
00276     }

00350 #define p3DEQ_LAST(head, ele, tmpel, nxt) \
00351     if (head == NULL) \
00352       ele = NULL; \
00353     else \
00354     { \
00355       ele = head; \
00356         if (ele->nxt == NULL) \

00388 #define p3DEQ(head, ele, tmpel, nxt) \
00389   tmpel = NULL; \
00390     if (ele != NULL && head == ele) \
00391     { \
00392       head = ele->nxt; \
00393       ele->nxt = NULL; \
00394       tmpel = ele; \
00395     } \
00396     else if (head != NULL) \
00397     { \
00398       tmpel = head; \
00399         while ((tmpel->nxt != NULL) && (tmpel->nxt != ele)) \
00400           tmpel = tmpel->nxt; \
00401         if (tmpel->nxt != NULL) \
00402         { \
00403           tmpel->nxt = ele->nxt; \
00404           ele->nxt = NULL; \
00405         } \
00406         else \
00407           tmpel = NULL; \
00408     }
00409 
00428 #define p3DEQ_DBL(head, ele, nxt, prv) \
00429     if (ele != NULL) \
00430     { \
00431         if (ele->prv != NULL) \
00432           ele->prv->nxt = ele->nxt; \
00433         else if (head == ele) \
00434           head = ele->nxt; \
00435         if (ele->nxt != NULL) \
00436           ele->nxt->prv = ele->prv; \
00437       ele->nxt = ele->prv = NULL; \
00438     }
00439 
00452 #define p3Q_LAST(head, ele, nxt) \
00453     if (head == NULL) \
00454       ele = NULL; \
00455     else \
00456     { \
00457       ele = head; \
00458         while (ele->nxt != NULL) \
00459           ele = ele->nxt; \
